# The `DebugULEB128DieRefPatch` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This structure is used to update reference to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> of ULEB128 form. <a href="#details">More...</a>
